items.title: England cricketer Brook apologises after nightclub altercation
items.description: England's Harry Brook apologises after being involved in an altercation with a nightclub bouncer the night before an ODI on the tour of New Zealand th...

items.title: One million without heat and water after Russian strikes, Ukraine says
items.description: Efforts are continuing to restore services in Dnipropetrovsk, officials say, after wide-spread attacks in the southeast.

items.title: Tesco and M&S report strong  Christmas food sales
items.description: Both major retailers report strong food sales, but M&S says sales of clothing and homeware fell.

items.title: Captain Romero appears to call out Spurs hierachy
items.description: Tottenham captain Cristian Romero appears to take aim at the club's hierarchy, accusing them of telling "lies" in a since edited Instagram post.

items.title: Elon Musk's Grok AI appears to have made child sexual imagery, says charity
items.description: It said analysts discovered the images on a dark-web forum, by users who claimed to have used Grok
